pageContext.claim: “Dr. Fauci said we've done a fantastic job. He just said it yesterday actually. He said we've done a fantastic job, that we didn't mislead anybody.”
pageContext.analysis: Trump appears to be talking about a Trump campaign commercial which took a Fauci comment out of context. After the ad asserts, “President Trump tackled the virus head on as leaders should,” it follows with a clip of Fauci appearing to endorse that claim: “I can't imagine that anybody could be doing more.” But Fauci was discussing the workload of the coronavirus task force, not praising Trump. The ad angered Fauci, who issued this statement: "In my nearly five decades of public service, I have never publicly endorsed any political candidate. The comments attributed to me without my permission in the GOP campaign ad were taken out of context from a broad statement I made months ago about the efforts of federal public health officials.” but the Trump campaign refused to take down the ad.
